author: Eric Peckham
title: Despite pandemic, gaming is well-positioned to withstand recession
description: Efforts to slow the spread of COVID-19 have led to a global economic downturn, but the gaming industry is booming. With hundreds of millions of people sequestered in their homes, game usage has spiked. And while the economic repercussions will persist after p…
content:
Efforts to slow the spread of COVID-19 have led to a global economic downturn, but the gaming industry is booming.
